front.p: 1869 April? to McLeanATL Object #1006020 from MS-Papers-0032-0222.

body.p: Herewith I return your two Independents you kindly sent me with thanks. I think you may gather somewhat (political) from Fox’s speech.—Should you note anything in your Otago papers concerning Bp. Jenner, I would thank you to allow me a sight when you may have quite done with them:—I expect there will be some warm work down there with his crosses & candlesticks!
I send you a few of our peaches, and beg you to accept the same—I would they were better.
What a blowing dirty day this has been! I pity the folks on the Flats. I have not been in Town for the week.
